title: Basic
description: Essential package with customer support, user dashboard, basic analytics, and limited media.

title: Standard
description: More features than Basic, including extra images and a standard video.

title: Advanced
description: For advanced users with enhanced analytics and more media options.

title: Plus
description: Premium package with more analytics, images, and multiple videos.

title: Pro
description: Professional-grade with advanced analytics, numerous images, and multiple videos.
